Entries.Title: Changes in version 1.12.0
Entries.Description: Join Tower Collector community on Facebook (new!) or Google+ to get help and share your ideas :)
Messages: Added export to CSV using OpenCellID.org values formatting (can be uploaded on website).
Added option to hide Collector notification from lock screen and status bar unless expanded on Android 4.1+.
Improved auto update source selection to open app market if possible and then website.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 1.11.0
Messages: Added number of main and neighboring cells to main screen.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 1.10.0
Messages: Introducing support for granting Android permissions at runtime.
Improved display of 'restart needed' message in Preferences.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 1.9.3
Messages: Fixed 'GPS status' and 'incorrect system time' information not updated correctly.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 1.9.2
Messages: Fixed crash when stopping Collector on some devices.
Fixed network type settings not opened on Android Ice Cream Sandwich.
Hidden 'Network type' menu item if system is unable to open it.
